thread.title: Ibuddy66
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Ibuddy66

author: Ibuddy66
title: Ibuddy66
text:
I have never had a bad experience with Antique Lamp supply. They are there for you every step of the way. If you're not sure about what product you need or are having trouble finding something give them a quick call and they'll help you out.
Great quick shipping and great products. They carry some really fantastic items that can be hard to find anywhere else.
